name: Blueberry Banana Spinach Smoothie 🥗
description: Boost your energy and nourish your body with this blueberry banana spinach smoothie, made with fresh greens, berries, and almond milk. It's a delicious and healthy way to start your day.
instructions: Place the blueberries, spinach, and banana in a blender or food processor and blend until just combined.
Add in the ice and continue to blend until the mixture is smooth.
